entries: The Guild Wars franchise is the flagship franchise of the Washington state based development studio ArenaNet.
The 16th entry into it's now 20 year old story is Guild Wars 2 Visions of Eternity.
This book aims to capture the story and the feelings of this beloved game, and bring them to the gaming table with the help of the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition rule set.
All credit goes to the amazing people at ArenaNet and NCSoft, who have given us players such magical adventures.

optionalfeature.name: Experimental Union

prerequisite.other: Access to the Amalgam Elite Specialization.

entries: Through asuran ingenuity, you are host to a mercurial mold. You are able to command it using selectable morph skills that replace your toolbelt skills or even fully merge with it to evolve into a superior being. Morph skills selected will alter the composition of the mercurial mold, changing the bonuses it grants you when you evolve. Gain access to stance utility skills.

optionalfeature.name: Stainless Steel
entries: Convert conditions to boons when you use a stance skill or evolve.

optionalfeature.name: Innervating Alloy
entries: Heal every second while you have barrier. Heal when you evolve.

optionalfeature.name: Hardened Chrome
entries: Morph skills and evolving grant protection to yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Hybrid Vigor

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Stainless Steel|GW2VoE} or {@optfeature Innervating Alloy|GW2VoE} or {@optfeature Hardened Chrome|GW2VoE}

entries: Gain vitality. Gain barrier when you use a morph skill.

optionalfeature.name: Carbolic Composition
entries: Amalgam skills inflict poison on hit. Poison you inflict lasts longer.

optionalfeature.name: Mercurial Tendencies
entries: Disabling an enemy reduces the cooldown of Evolve.

optionalfeature.name: Silver Lining
entries: Evolve no longer inherits bonuses from strains. Morph skills grant their strain bonuses.

optionalfeature.name: Willing Host

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Carbolic Composition|GW2VoE} or {@optfeature Mercurial Tendencies|GW2VoE} or {@optfeature Silver Lining|GW2VoE}

entries: Using a morph skill increases your damage for a duration.

optionalfeature.name: Symbiotic Synergy
entries: Evolve recharges morph skills. Morph skills deal increased strike damage.

optionalfeature.name: New Genes
entries: Evolve grants boons to allies. Grant an additional boon based on which morph skill was used.

optionalfeature.name: Double Helix
entries: Evolve has two charges and grants an increased attribute bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Minor Adept
entries: Your elemental magic has taken the form of four spirits of the wild. You gain the {@optfeature Evocation|GW2VoE} minor adept trait.

subclassFeature.name: Healing Skill
entries: Take comfort in you spirit familiar. You gain access to the {@optfeature Rejuvenate|GW2VoE} healing skill and now have the option to learn it when you choose your healing skill.

subclassFeature.name: Major Adept
entries: Your bond to your animal spirit has grown. You gain the choice of one of the following major adept traits: {@optfeature Fiery Might|GW2VoE}, {@optfeature Altruistic Aspect|GW2VoE}, or {@optfeature Spirit's Succor|GW2VoE}. You can change which trait you have learned during a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Utility Skill
entries: Channeling the fury of your fox spirit, you gain access to the {@optfeature Fox's Fury|GW2VoE} utility skill and now have the option to learn it when you choose your utility skill.

subclassFeature.name: Minor Master
entries: Your familiar has given you a boost to one of your {@variantrule Boon|GW2|boons}. You gain the {@optfeature Enhanced Potency|GW2VoE} minor master trait.

subclassFeature.name: Utility Skill
entries: Your otter familiar has given you access to the ability to heal and support your allies. You gain access to the {@optfeature Otter's Compassion|GW2VoE} utility skill and now have the option to learn it when you choose your utility skill.

subclassFeature.name: Major Master
entries: You have mastered your bond with your familiar. You gain the choice of one of the following major master traits: {@optfeature Familiar's Focus|GW2VoE}, {@optfeature Familiar's Blessing|GW2VoE}, or {@optfeature Elemental Dynamo|GW2VoE}. You can change which trait you have learned during a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Utility Skill
entries: Quickly dashing across the battlefield, your lightning hare spirit grants you the ability to move with incredible speed. You gain access to the {@optfeature Hare's Agility|GW2VoE} utility skill and now have the option to learn it when you choose your utility skill.

subclassFeature.name: Minor Grandmaster
entries: Channeling the power of your familiar gives a small boost. You gain the {@optfeature Familiar's Prowess|GW2VoE} minor grandmaster trait.

subclassFeature.name: Utility Skill
entries: Your toad familiar has granted you resilience and protection. You gain access to the {@optfeature Toad's Fortitude|GW2VoE} utility skill and now have the option to learn it when you choose your utility skill.

subclassFeature.name: Major Grandmaster
entries: You perfectly embody the spirits of the wild in your elemental Magic. You gain the choice of one of the following major grandmaster traits: {@optfeature Galvanic Enchantment|GW2HoT}, {@optfeature Elemental Balance|GW2HoT}, or {@optfeature Specialized Elements|GW2HoT}. You can change which trait you have learned during a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Elite Skill
entries: Summon all your elemental familiars at once, unleashing their combined power. You gain access to the {@optfeature Elemental Procession|GW2VoE} elite skill and now have the option to learn it when you choose your elite skill.
